Well, you did take my plus-one.
I'm so sorry. Would you like us to leave?
We could-- I don't know how we're getting out of here, though.
We're-- We're out to sea. Is there an Uber for boats?
translation.ja: ボートのハイヤーはある？

translation.en: -Out-- Out of the room, Nick. -Out of the room?
We can go out of the room, absolutely--
No.
That won't be necessary.
-Okay. So we'll stick around. -So we stay. Okay.
My nephew, Charles, who always finds a way to keep me on my toes.
translation.ja: 甥のチャールズはいつも 私に油断するなと教える

translation.en: My friend, the Colonel, who's kept me safe these many years.
translation.ja: 大佐は何年も私の身を 守ってくれた

translation.en: Vikram, whose family fortunes have always been intertwined with my own.
translation.ja: ヴィックの家と私の財産は 互いに利益をもたらす

translation.en: And my Tobias.
All I ever wanted was a son,
and here you are.
My boy.
I've spoken to all of you about your position in my will.
translation.ja: 私は今の内容を 遺書に書いていた

translation.en: I have thought long and hard about what each of you is truly worth,
translation.ja: 君たちがその内容に 相応しいか考えていた

translation.en: and I've come to this conclusion.
You are all leeches.
Repugnant. Blood fat.
Suckling on the tit of my good work for so many years.
translation.ja: 長い時間をかけて 私が稼いだ金に群がっている

translation.en: You repulse me.
[under breath] Can't get this on a bus, baby.
-This is incredible. -I know it.
translation.ja: 面白い　感謝するよ

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
[Malcolm] Which is why I have drafted a new will.
translation.ja: ここに 新しい遺言書がある

translation.en: It states that my entire fortune
translation.ja: 私の全財産を譲る相手は

translation.en: goes to Suzi.
[Malcolm] From this moment forth,
you are all cut off.
Abandoned.
And perhaps, after I've done you this kindness,
translation.ja: これは君たちへの思いやりだ

translation.en: you will finally be able to make something of yourselves... on your own.
translation.ja: これで君たちは自らの努力で 出世するだろう

translation.en: Apparently, she's had enough of my caviar.
translation.ja: 小判の価値が分からぬ猫だ

translation.en: -That was funny. -Shh.
[Malcolm] Darling.
[Charles] You could've signed this at home. Instead, you called us here to humiliate us?
translation.ja: わざわざ全員を呼び出して 目の前で屈辱を？

translation.en: [Malcolm] Yes, and you came running.
translation.ja: そうとも　ぬか喜びだ

translation.en: Father, don't do this.
Or what?
[Malcolm] Yes.
That's what I thought.
[Vik] Don't shoot me! Don't shoot me, please!
-Daddy! -[screams]
You shot him!
No! I saw someone stab him.
translation.ja: 違う　誰かが刺すのを見た

translation.en: -Who? -I don't know.
What happened? I heard a scr--
Malcolm!
Oh, God!
Has anybody tried to revive him?
He's got a knife plunged in his heart. I don't think he's revivable.
translation.ja: 心臓に刺さってる 生き返らない

translation.en: Should we pull it out?
No. It's a foot-long knife. It's just like pulling--
translation.ja: よせ　長くて危険だ

translation.en: Oh, God!
Wow! You should have left the knife in for the po-po, Colonel, man!
translation.ja: 警察が来るまで触るなよ

translation.en: -I'll put it back. -Don't put it back.
Oh! Will you listen to my husband? He's a detective.
translation.ja: 聞いて　夫は刑事よ

translation.en: Yes, yes. What should we do, Mr. Officer?
Well, for starters, let's stop removing and reinserting the murder weapon
translation.ja: まずは― 胸の剣を抜いたり 刺したりするのはやめよう

translation.en: into the victim's chest.
translation.ja: 胸の剣を抜いたり 刺したりするのはやめよう

translation.en: In fact, let's stop touching the body altogether.
translation.ja: というか遺体に触れるな

translation.en: He was gonna take it all away.
translation.ja: 奪われるところだった

translation.en: For you.
[Vik] Yo... Did he sign it?
translation.ja: そういえば 署名は？

translation.en: No.
Yes!
We should make sure he doesn't have another copy on him.
Rifling through the pockets of the corpse counts as touching, yup.
translation.ja: ポケットも触っちゃダメだ

translation.en: Sorry to single you out like that, Ms. Ballard. You're wonderful.
translation.ja: あなたに言ったのは 一段と美しいから

translation.en: -You look extravagant tonight. -[Audrey] Okay. What's next?
translation.ja: 一段と美しいから それから？

translation.en: We have to preserve the crime scene.
Captain Wong, is there any way you can lock off this place?
translation.ja: 船長　部屋に鍵は かけられる？

translation.en: Yes, of course.
So we should then start questioning the suspects.
Suspects?
We're not questioning anybody.
Wong, when you finish locking up here, you bring me the key.
translation.ja: 閉めたら鍵は俺に渡して

translation.en: Then you radio Interpol, tell 'em we'll meet 'em at the docks in Monaco.
translation.ja: 無線でモナコに インターポールを呼んでくれ

translation.en: In the meantime, I'm gonna check the shrimp out a little closer.
translation.ja: 俺はエビを詳しく確認する

translation.en: For the investigation?
No, Wong, because I'm hungry as shit.
translation.ja: いや　腹が減ってる

translation.en: The rest of you, I'd lock yourselves in your chambers or your yacht rooms
translation.ja: みんなは部屋に戻って 鍵をかけろ

translation.en: because one of us...
is a murderer.
-Audrey. -Yeah?
Get the cocktail sauce.
Yep.
Wait a second. What on earth is on these?
translation.ja: 待って このエビは何？

translation.en: I don't know. This Maurice guy must breastfeed each shrimp individually.
translation.ja: シェフが手塩にかけて 育てたのかもな

translation.en: I mean, they live so well.
-Oh, God, yeah. -God.
All right. Where were we? Okay, okay, okay.
You know what? There had to be two people in on the killing.
translation.ja: 絶対に犯人は２人いるはず

translation.en: Because how could they know when the lights were gonna go out?
translation.ja: 照明を消した人がいる

translation.en: -That's smart, that's smart. -Right?
I'm tired as hell right now. I'm gonna go to sleep.
-Are you kidding me? -What?
You're not jet-lagged?
-Nick. -[groans]
-Honey, come on, seriously. -Huh?
Who do you think did it?
I don't think. I know.
Who?
It was the son.
-Tobey. -No.
No way. Not a chance. It's too obvious.
translation.ja: いえ　ウソよ あり得ないわ

translation.en: The most obvious suspect is never, never the killer.
translation.ja: 怪しい人物は犯人じゃない

translation.en: The most obvious suspect is always the killer.
translation.ja: 怪しい人物が常に犯人だよ

translation.en: When a wife gets killed, 90% of the time it was the husband.
translation.ja: 妻が殺されたら 90％は夫が犯人だぜ

translation.en: Why did you just use that as an example?
And I disagree.
I think people are more complicated than that.
translation.ja: 人って もっと複雑よ

translation.en: Judging off of what? Those books that you read?
translation.ja: 大好きなミステリーが 元ネタか？

translation.en: People are simple, okay?
translation.ja: 人は単純だ だから犯人はトビー

translation.en: It was Tobey.
He had the most to gain, and he also had the most to lose.
translation.ja: いちばん得をする人間で 失いかけた人間

translation.en: Which is exactly why he's not the killer.
Did you ever fool around on a boat?
Do you know how much fun that could be? I just lay here and the boat does all the work.
translation.ja: 揺れるから 俺は横になってればいい

translation.en: -That's so convenient for you. -You know I have a bad back.
translation.ja: 不精ね 腰痛なんだよ

translation.en: So convenient for you.
What about the lights?
Yeah, leave 'em on. I don't care. Either way. Lady's choice.
translation.ja: どっちでもいい 消したきゃ消して

translation.en: Shh! No. Who turned out those lights?
What?! Oh!
Don't look at me like that. I can feel it.
translation.ja: にらむな　分かってる

translation.en: -I'm sorry. Excuse me. -Will you take the Allegra?
translation.ja: ごめん アレグラを飲んどけ

translation.en: It's the same stuff.
-I don't want to talk about it. -Oh, God.
translation.ja: その話はやめて そうか

translation.en: [Audrey] Enter the brilliant yet tortured detective,
right on cue.
My name is Inspector Laurent Delacroix.
translation.ja: 私はドラクロワ警部補だ

translation.en: I will now summon you one by one to the grand lounge for questioning.
translation.ja: １人ずつ呼ぶので 質問に答えてもらう

translation.en: Why is that smoke ring so good? How did he do that?
translation.ja: うまいね　どうやるんだ？

translation.en: Oh, you broke it. You broke it.
Tell me about Malcolm Quince.
He was the most wonderful--
Swine.
He was the love of my life.
He was a complicated man.
Describe to me what happened.
Yo, Mr. French Policeman, man. It was mad. Lights went out.
translation.ja: いいとも あれは普通じゃないよ 電気が消えた

translation.en: [Colonel] I thought I saw something move, and I shot.
translation.ja: 何かが動いたので撃った

translation.en: Yes. Finish line.
The old man got what was coming to him.
One-eight-seven, motherfu--
Did anyone touch the body?
No.
And did you notice anything else out of the ordinary?
translation.ja: それと… 普段と違う点はあった？

translation.en: -[all] The Americans. -Yes, number one. Yes.
translation.ja: アメリカ人 ナンバー１

translation.en: [Audrey] Aren't you gonna, um... Aren't you gonna separate us?
translation.ja: 私たち２人一緒でいいの？

translation.en: -For the interrogation. -[Nick] Okay.
Question us separately, see if our...
-What are you doing? -...answers match.
What? I'm just saying, our answers will match
translation.ja: 言っただけよ 無実だから平気だわ

translation.en: -because we're innocent. -Yeah, that's right.
translation.ja: 無実だから平気だわ そうだな

translation.en: There we go.
God, you are really good at that. [chuckles]
We found this in Tobey Quince's suite.
translation.ja: トビーの部屋で これを見つけた

translation.en: A typewritten suicide note
in which he confesses to the murder of his father.
translation.ja: 父親の殺害を自供している

translation.en: Typewritten? -Mm-mm. -That's not very common.
translation.ja: タイプで打つのは珍しい

translation.en: -Very suspicious. -[Nick] Yes.
Yeah, obviously someone is trying to frame Tobey for his father's murder.
translation.ja: 誰かがトビーに 罪をなすりつけてる

translation.en: -[Audrey] This is amazing. -[Nick] Look how excited she is.
translation.ja: 面白くなってきた 興奮する

translation.en: So where's your head at with this whole thing? I mean, who are your chief suspects?
translation.ja: 今のところ誰が 第一の容疑者？

translation.en: You.
-Woo, yes. -Right, of course,
-'cause everybody is a suspect. -Especially her. [laughs]
translation.ja: みんな怪しいわね 特に彼女

translation.en: This is a group of friends and family who have known each other for years.
translation.ja: 長年の友達や家族の集まりに

translation.en: You two show up, and ten hours later, two of them are dead.
translation.ja: 突然 君たちが現れて ２人死んだ

translation.en: Coincidence?
-Yes. -Absolutely.
translation.ja: そう バカげてるわ

translation.en: -Coincidence. -Wait. Excuse me. Are you saying that your theory
translation.ja: 待ってよ　つまり何？

translation.en: is that the two of us conned our way onto a stranger's boat at the last minute
translation.ja: 私たちはギリギリで うまく船に乗り込んで

translation.en: to commit premeditated murder that benefits us in no way? That's your theory?
translation.ja: 何の得にもならない 殺人を計画したわけ？

translation.en: Perhaps someone paid you to do it.
-No. -Paid us to do it? [laughs]
Oh, my gosh. I would love to see that. Show me that money.
translation.ja: そんなお金があれば 見せてほしいわ

translation.en: [Audrey] Do you want to see our bank statements?
translation.ja: 通帳を見せましょうか？

translation.en: [stammers] We're broke.
translation.ja: 通帳を見せましょうか？ メチャ貧乏

translation.en: Desperate for money. I see.
Now you gave him a motive.
-No, no, no. I know. Just don't... -We did this because--
translation.ja: そうじゃない 俺たちには何もないなんて 言うからだ

translation.en: -...take my words out of context. -We got nothing. -That's all we got, is nothing. -No.
translation.ja: 俺たちには何もないなんて 言うからだ

translation.en: Listen, I am talking to you, detective to detective.
translation.ja: 刑事同士で話そうじゃないか

translation.en: We didn't do this. -You can see in my eyes. You can tell. -Mm-mm.
translation.ja: やってない 目を見れば分かるだろ？

translation.en: Perhaps I will have that word with you independently.
I di-- Hey!
I can get up.
Hey, okay.
[Nick] I'll be out in a minute.
[Nick] I love you.
I'm sorry. She's just excited because it's--
translation.ja: 妻は はしゃいでるんだ

translation.en: -She reads books, and this is fun for her. -[door closes]
translation.ja: ミステリー小説が 大好きだからね

translation.en: You wish me to believe you're innocent.
Unfortunately, I do not believe liars.
But I'm telling you the truth.
And how long have you been lying to your wife?
translation.ja: 妻にはウソをついてる

translation.en: Excuse me?
You did not think that we would investigate your background,
translation.ja: 君のことを 調べていないとでも？

translation.en: Sergeant Nicholas Spitz, NYPD?
translation.ja: ＮＹ市警の ニコラス･スピッツ巡査

translation.en: Failed his detective's exam three times.
translation.ja: 刑事への昇進試験に ３度落ちた

translation.en: You are, how you do say, cop on the beat,
translation.ja: 君は何というか “町の警官”で―

translation.en: not detective as you so claim.
So I... tell people I'm a detective.
translation.ja: 周りに刑事だと 話したとしても

translation.en: There's-- That's not a crime.
Impersonating a detective is a crime.
translation.ja: なりすますのは犯罪だ

translation.en: I didn't think it was a crime here. I thought maybe you guys had different rules. That doesn't make us murderers.
translation.ja: それが犯罪だとしても 殺人犯とは言えない

translation.en: A broke, failed man, lying to his wife? I think it does.
translation.ja: 貧乏で失敗ばかりの男なら あり得る

translation.en: You don't have any evidence. You can't hold us.
translation.ja: 証拠がないから拘束できない

translation.en: No, but I can hold these.
translation.ja: そうだが これは預かる

translation.en: I believe Mr. Cavendish has provided accommodations for you
translation.ja: キャヴェンディッシュ氏の はからいで

translation.en: at the Hotel de Savoie, so you won't be on the street.
translation.ja: サヴォアホテルに泊まれる

translation.en: But mark my words, Officer Spitz,
translation.ja: 覚えておきたまえ スピッツ巡査

translation.en: I will not rest until I prove that you committed these murders.
translation.ja: 不眠不休で君たちの殺人を 立証する

translation.en: And I...
translation.ja: 俺は休ませてもらう 疲れてるんでね

translation.en: will rest, because I'm tired as shit, at that hotel you just said.
translation.ja: 俺は休ませてもらう 疲れてるんでね そのホテルは高級そうだ

translation.en: It sounds like a good one.
translation.ja: そのホテルは高級そうだ

translation.en: But after I'm well-rested and I eat breakfast--
hopefully the guy cooks as good as Maurice--
translation.ja: ここの料理ぐらい うまいかな？

translation.en: I will not rest until I prove to you we have nothing to do with these murders.
translation.ja: それが済んだら 不眠不休で無実を証明するさ

translation.en: [man] Juan Carlos!
[woman] Juan Carlos!
[Audrey] Charles said that everyone's gonna be at this race,
translation.ja: 〝モナコ グランプリ〞 全員がレースを見に来てるわ

translation.en: so whoever did this is gonna be there.
translation.ja: 〝モナコ グランプリ〞 〝モナコ グランプリ〞 つまり犯人がいる つまり犯人がいる

translation.en: We have to figure out who it is.
I know we've gotta figure it out. This isn't one of your books, sweetheart.
translation.ja: 分かってる これは小説じゃないぞ

translation.en: I mean, it's like one of your books, but this is real.
translation.ja: 似てはいるけど現実だ

translation.en: Like, two people are dead, for real.
-I know. -There's a real killer on the real loose.
Hey, babe. Relax. What's-- What's wrong with you?
translation.ja: 落ち着いてよ　どうしたの？

translation.en: For real? Come on. Will you just focus...
translation.ja: 大丈夫？ 集中して一緒に捜してよ

translation.en: -Fine. -...on this with me?
translation.ja: 集中して一緒に捜してよ

translation.en: Um, yes. Uh...
[Nick] Okay. So there are three basic motives for every murder.
translation.ja: 殺人の３大動機といえば…

translation.en: [Audrey] Yes. The first one is money.
Right.
Everyone was in Quince's will, except Suzi.
-Okay. -All right. The second one is love.
We know nobody loved that guy 'cause he was kind of a prick.
translation.ja: 誰もあいつを愛してない

translation.en: Suzi might have loved him.
-That's what you would think-- -Okay, what's the third one?
-Revenge. -Right.
That's the one we should be thinking about.
I'm telling you, if we figure out who hates this guy the most, that's our killer.
translation.ja: 彼を最も憎む人物が犯人だ

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
So, this beard... It's incredible.
translation.ja: そのヒゲはとても立派ね

translation.en: Do you oil that or condition?
translation.ja: オイルや コンディショナーを？

translation.en: You won't get anything out of him.
Oh, my gosh.
Most of his life, he's been serving men like me and Malcolm,
translation.ja: 彼は人に仕える人生を選んだ

translation.en: despite being an heir to millions.
He's rich, too?
He's supposed to be, but he's one of 16 children, and he's half French.
translation.ja: そうだが 16人きょうだいで 半分フランス人だ

translation.en: Are you familiar with French inheritance law?
Broad strokes.
That Colonel guy, he's getting on my nerves.
translation.ja: あの大佐は気に食わねえ

translation.en: -Yeah. -Shit. Walking around
translation.ja: そうだな 君が殺したと言ってるぜ

translation.en: -saying you killed both those guys. -Huh? -Yeah. -What?
translation.ja: 君が殺したと言ってるぜ

translation.en: And I'm like, come on.
-My man wouldn't do-- -Yo. Look, yo. I didn't do nothing, son.
translation.ja: 待ってくれ 僕は何もしてない

translation.en: -It doesn't matter what the will says. -Uh-huh.
The fortune must be divided equally among the offspring.
translation.ja: 財産は子供たちで 均等に分ける

translation.en: Why do the French have such a law?
Well, they do it to keep all Frenchmen from doing what Malcolm was trying to do,
translation.ja: マルコムみたいな行為を 阻止するためだ

translation.en: and leaving everything to their mistresses.
translation.ja: 愛人に持っていかれる

translation.en: [Audrey] Oh.
-My theory is... -Yeah?
...Juan Carlos done it, man.
What? Why would he do that?
Well, Juan Carlos's dad used to race for Malcolm.
translation.ja: 父親がレーサーだった

translation.en: Malcolm tried to get slick on some safety angle, and shit got overlooked. -Yeah? -Okay.
translation.ja: マルコムのチームにいたが 安全対策をケチったんだよ

translation.en: Juan Carlos's dad lost both his legs, G.
translation.ja: そして父親は 両足を失ったのさ

translation.en: Yeah, straight up. [imitates bones snapping]
-Oh. -Gone.
So it's payback time.
A hundred percent of a doubt.
Wh-What?
-Juan Carlos is your man. -Oh, yeah.
translation.ja: 奴が犯人だ マジか　保証する？

translation.en: You guarantee that?
Guarantee.
Respect.
Or maybe Sergei could have done it.
-Yeah. -Okay. So you're not guaranteeing it.
No, not a hundred percent. No.
-[sneezes] -Oh! Bless you.
Would you like some Allegra?
-I doubt that would be useful. -I know.
translation.ja: 効かない そうなのよ ニックに何度も言ってる

translation.en: It doesn't work. I tried to tell that to Nick.
translation.ja: そうなのよ ニックに何度も言ってる

translation.en: Do you need something?
Uh, no. Mm-mm.
The guy that throws me off the most-- Cavendish--
translation.ja: チャールズは読みにくい

translation.en: to me, he seems like he's compensating for something,
translation.ja: 何かを覆い隠してる気が するんだ

translation.en: with the Great Gatsby look and the jawline
and the "hey, I'm so gorgeous." Am I right?
translation.ja: 色男を気取ることでな

translation.en: There's absolutely nothing wrong with Charles Cavendish.
-Isn't that the-- -Except...
he probably murdered his uncle.
Well, that's one thing wrong.
[commentator] ...comes to the checkered flag! It's Juan Carlos!
translation.ja: １着はなんと フアン･カルロス！

translation.en: Winner of this year's Monte Carlo Grand Prix!
translation.ja: グランプリを制しました

translation.en: [Audrey] I find that Suzi Nakamura very suspicious.
She's the only one who didn't have a motive.
-It was Cavendish and you know it. -You just-- No, you just don't like him.
translation.ja: チャールズだ 嫌いなのね

translation.en: I don't like him. I don't. I hate his guts, but that's not it.
translation.ja: 嫌いだけど それが理由じゃない

translation.en: -Did you just steal all of those? -He's the sole blood heir.
translation.ja: 盗んだ？ 今は唯一の親族だし―

translation.en: He stands to make the biggest claim for the fortune.
translation.ja: 今は唯一の親族だし― 財産を欲しがってる

translation.en: I want one of these.
-Malcolm stole his fiancée. -Okay.
That's all three motives. Money, love, revenge.
translation.ja: まさに３大動機の 金と愛と復讐だ

translation.en: We went past it. I don't know where we are.
We're over here. Will you please try one of these?
No! Oh, my God. You know what?
translation.ja: ダメよ 言っとくけど

translation.en: I think you just think it's Cavendish 'cause you're jealous of him.
translation.ja: それは彼に対する嫉妬よ

translation.en: -[scoffs] Oh, God. -Yeah.
-I'm jealous of him. -You are. What? Why? What am I jealous of?
translation.ja: 嫉妬なんてするかよ なぜ俺が？

translation.en: What is there to be jealous-- He's rich. He's charming.
translation.ja: お金持ちだわ チャーミングだし

translation.en: He smells great.
What do you mean? What's he smell like?
He smells like he just came out of the dryer.
What the-- What the--
[Audrey] No, no, no.
Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!
We should test that for fingerprints first.
Okay. Do you have the fingerprint testing kit?
-What? -'Cause I didn't pack mine.
translation.ja: なに？ 俺は持ってきてない

translation.en: Is it in your bag?
Stop it! Come on.
Hurry.
